select
distinct
from t_cust_base_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_cust_base_info (CUST_BASE_INFO_ID, CUSTOMER_NO, CHN_NAME, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, AGE, NATIVE_PLACE, DRIVING_LICENSE, RC_STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPER_COM_ID, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, AGENT_ID, ID_VALIDITY_DATE, CUST_LEVEL, CUST_OBTAIN_WAY, PRE_CUST_CONVERT_CUST_TIME, INVEST_CUSTOMER_TYPE, INVEST_AUDIT_STATE) values (#{custBaseInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivingLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operComId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idValidityDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{custLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custObtainWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preCustConvertCustTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{investCustomerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investAuditState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
